title: A carpenter had a piece of wood that was 15 feet in length. If he needs only 10 and 5-twelfth feet of wood, how much wood should be cut? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assumption is the carpenter needs 10 and 5/12 feet of wood length from this same piece. In this case, the amount of wood cut can be either: 10 feet 5 inches if measured from one end to the length needed, or 4 feet 7 inches if measured from the other end to the amount to be cut off.
4 and 7 / 12 - 4ft 7 inches - off of 15 ft leaves 10 5/12 ten ft five inch neeed
